Articles.Content: Is there a way of turning on the whole RAM???
install Linux and use the 64 Bit version.... for the 32 Bit windows version: no

You can use a 64bit hack for windows KSP but it is not offically supported by squad and can cause some weird bugs, From my playing with it Ive found that it works pretty well but you sometimes get an unusual bug. You can read the whole thread here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/117224-Windows-64-bit-community-workaround

Or download this tool by Youen from https://github.com/neuoy/KSPWin64/releases

But again, it isnt offically supported and can be buggy at times, and the bugs may not be related to mods.

There are a bunch of little tweaks you can do to optimize KSP; they vary with what your hardware & software is. Post the specs for your CPU, GPU (and how much VRAM it has), how much system RAM you have and what operating system you are using.
